function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Spreading of coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19)","Impact":"High infection rates, overwhelmed healthcare systems, and high mortality","Mitigation":"Implementing strict public health measures, improving ventilation, and reducing air pollution","Technologies":"Air purifiers, HVAC systems with advanced filtration, and air quality monitoring devices","People":"General population, healthcare workers, and vulnerable individuals","Owner":"Government, public health organizations, building owners"},{"Description":"Indoor airborne transmission of viruses","Impact":"Increased risk of infection in crowded and poorly ventilated environments","Mitigation":"Enhancing indoor ventilation systems, maintaining clean indoor air, and reducing overcrowding","Technologies":"Advanced HVAC systems, air purifiers, and air quality monitoring devices","People":"Occupants of indoor spaces, building owners, and facilities managers","Owner":"Building owners, facilities managers, public health organizations"},{"Description":"High association of COVID-19 infection with air pollution","Impact":"Increased vulnerability of the population to virus-related health risks","Mitigation":"Reducing air pollution, improving outdoor air quality, and promoting green and sustainable urban development","Technologies":"Air quality monitoring devices, emission control technologies, and sustainable urban planning","People":"General population, individuals in high-pollution areas, and vulnerable groups","Owner":"Government, environmental agencies, urban planners"}]}
